general_advisory: Monitor the activity of Gundhy bug in rice field and use rotten snail traps. Regularly check for infestation levels in rice fields and consult a veterinary doctor for animal vaccination and deworming.

advisory: Make alleys in the field for better aeration and sunlight penetration.
Harvest early matured paddy crops with 85% maturity.
Reduce moisture content of harvested paddy.
Ensure cleanliness of threshing floor and storage godown.
Complete land preparation and sowing of mustard crop.
Use suitable varieties like Toria - Anuradha, Parbati, Sushree, Indian mustard - NRCHB 101, Mahyco bold, JD 6, Sampoorna.
Apply recommended fertilizer doses and ratios for Toria and Mustard crops.
Complete land preparation and sowing of mustard crop.
Use suitable varieties like Toria - Anuradha, Parbati, Sushree, Indian mustard - NRCHB 101, Mahyco bold, JD 6, Sampoorna.
Apply recommended fertilizer doses and ratios for Toria and Mustard crops.
Select suitable varieties of Cole crops, Chilli, and Brinjal for nursery bed preparation.
Treat seedlings with appropriate fungicides before transplanting.
Select suitable varieties of papaya seedlings considering damage from cyclone Dana.
Apply recommended Fipronil during planting to minimize virus incidence.
Maintain ideal dissolved oxygen levels in the pond with aeration methods.
Consider circulating pond water for oxygenation.
Ensure vaccination against common diseases like FMD, Haemorrhagic Septicaemia, Black Quarter, and Enterotoxemia in animals.
